       <div class="module callout">
        <h2 id="contentmaster_1_pagemaincontent_2_columncalloutlast_0_callout_header">
         Double Your Impact for Kids Like Kate
        </h2>
        <div class="module-body">
         <div class="callout_image image_body " id="contentmaster_1_pagemaincontent_2_columncalloutlast_0_pnlImageNoWrap">
          <img alt="Katie is a happy 5-year-old." class="img-responsive shadow img-responsive" src="/-/media/cincinnati childrens/home/default/giving column/home-giving-6-15-18-kate-journey-230x.jpg?h=224&amp;w=230&amp;la=en&amp;hash=2D18524DCD047B26C3384FACBAF1856DA7D85119"/>
         </div>
         <p>
          When Kate’s parents learned she’d be born with a cleft lip and palate, they were filled with concerns for their daughter’s future.
          <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TqmJFhbxLRw" target="_blank" title="Watch Kate’s journey on Youtube.">
           Watch Kate’s journey
          </a>
          , and see how Cincinnati Children’s has been there for her, and her family, every step of the way.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://giving.cincinnatichildrens.org/spring-match" target="_blank" title="Make a donation today.">
           Make a donation today
          </a>
          and double your impact for more kids like Kate. Each gift made before Thursday, June 21, will be matched up to $25,000.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>

        <div class="module-body">
